title: Talentstream
description: TalentStream specializes in helping organizations find premier technical talent in the fields of High-Skilled Manufacturing, Supply Chain, and Technology.  We are a woman-owned business that is dedicated to building strong relationships with both our candidates and clients. We offer deep industry experience and flexible staffing solutions to meet your business needs.  We provide talent on short-term and long-term contract positions, as well as direct hire placements for permanent needs.
